summary: HEATING COOLING SYSTEM = CAR OVERHEATED AND MECHANIC FOUND A CRACKED INTAKE MANIFOLD.  THERE HAVE BEEN QUITE A FEW COMPLAINTS ON THIS BY OTHER OWNERS - ONE DEALER EVEN STATES THIS IS A DEFECTIVE MANIFOLD.  BELIEVE FORD SHOULD RECALL THESE OR REPAIR THEM WHEN NEEDED AS THEY ARE DEFECTIVE.  *JB
